channel.title: How to stop massing?
channel.description: Edit: Look on page 2 for new post.

item.title: How to stop massing?
item.dc:creator: @MisterZ MisterZ
item.description:
@MisterZ wrote:

lol did you try ending it? With }… That might help a bit

public boolean process() { // is being called regularily every 500ms
long timeSpent = System.currentTimeMillis()-lastProcess; //stop rapid clicking to speed up timers
if(timeSpent >= server.cycleTime) {
timeSpent = server.cycleTime;
lastProcess = System.currentTimeMillis();
}

Read full topic

item.title: How to stop massing?
item.dc:creator: @girov123 girov123
item.description:
@girov123 wrote:

public boolean process() { long timeSpent = System.currentTimeMillis()-lastProcess; //stop rapid clicking to speed up timers if(timeSpent >= server.cycleTime) { timeSpent = server.cycleTime; lastProcess = System.currentTimeMillis();

Ok I found this little code on Wolf P16_Blitz (Thats what Pk-isle is based off)
But i get an error when adding it.

About missing a {} somewhere… can anyone help - i cant see where to put one.

item.title: How to stop massing?
item.dc:creator: @girov123 girov123
item.description:
@girov123 wrote:

Sorry if my explanation is a little off.
Ok… an e.g is in order:
Im level 3 combat, when i right click a monster or player it comes up with:
1#
Examine
Attack
Walk here

Im level 126 combat, when i right click a monster/player it comes up with:
2#
Attack - notice attack moved up
Examine
Walk here

Now 2# makes you able to mass click
now 1# You cant mass click
so i was wondering if i could change it so its always 1# there would be no massing.
Any idea’s

Read full topic

say wat??

item.title: How to stop massing?
item.dc:creator: @girov123 girov123
item.description:
@girov123 wrote:

I'm not really sure if there is a way to stop others from massing, because if there was, it would be in the tut section and a lot of people would have long added it into their servers

Yes of course i have and others have looked there, no luck im afraid.

EDIT: Idea - Im not sure if you can change the order of

Attack
Examine
Walk here

e.g when you low level combat it is

                                                  Examine
                                                  Walk here
                                                  Attack

So is there any to making it always say ^^^ even at a high level combat
[br][size=1]Posted on: March 26, 2007, 03:38:29 PM[/size][hr]Anyone think they know how to do that^^^^

Read full topic

item.title: How to stop massing?
item.dc:creator: @girov123 girov123
item.description:
@girov123 wrote:

I do not like disconnecting left right and center, im looking for a clean way of stopping it.
Ok i have an example for people who dont know what im on about.
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4151)) // whip
{
PkingDelay = 6;
wepdelay = 6;
resetanim = 4;
}

PkingDelay = 6;
wepdelay = 6; they work fine until you get above the combat level of the thing your attacking.
Then you can click as fast as possible and it hits them everytime you click, meaning monsters = easy as pie.

Read full topic

item.title: How to stop massing?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Search for something like this if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4151)) // whip { PkingDelay = 1; wepdelay = 1; resetanim = 1; } and change the wepdelay to 20, so the whip hits every 2 second. Not sure that will this work though.

Read full topic

item.description:
@girov123 wrote:

I think you have got the wrong end of the stick… unless im just being stupid
but im not trying to stop massing on objects becuase the delay works fine on them… just players/ncp’s.
Im not sure if it possible but could you put a delay on the ‘attack’ button?
if you dont know what the attack button is i mean when you

Attack
Examine
walk here

yet again to mass you dont use right click… hmm
